SEARCH
Module makao
Package makao.controller

Class LoggingController

java.lang.Object
makao.controller.LoggingController
public class LoggingController extends Object
LoggingController is a class that handles the logic for the login scene of the application. It allows users to input their username and password, and try to log in to the application. If the login is successful, the user is taken to the room selection scene. If the login fails, an error message is displayed.

    • tryToLogIn

      public void tryToLogIn() throws IOException
      Attempts to log in to the application using the username and password entered by the user.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • loginCorrect

      public void loginCorrect()
      This method is used when login is successful. It clears the fields and changes the scene to "choosing_room_scene.fxml"

    • loginFailed

      public void loginFailed()
      This method is used when login fails. It shows a warning message "Wrong username or password" and closes the socket.
